body.p: If you want to have/generate RRDTOOL graphs of resources, templates will be uploaded in plugin. You can access to this menu by Plugins > Monitoring > RRDTOOL templates.
The templates can be downloaded in GIT repository https://github.com/rrdtooltemplates/rrdtool_templates.
For the generation of graphs, 2 types of templates will be present:

ul.li: Perfdata: used to parse event and put in RRDTOOL file.
Graph: used to generate graph with data in the RRDTOOL file.
